attributes.comment:
Regarding Adjustment of the Immigration Benefit Application/ Petition and
Biometric Fee Schedule (Docket Number USCIS- 2006-0044): I would hope the U.S.
Government would consider the burden of additional expenses for prospective
parents seeking to adop a child from another country. The current fee to just
petition to adopt from another country are close to $700.

I realize everything is getting more expensive. Just please consider not raising
rates to much as it might make it prohibitive for families trying to make a
better life for themselves and children in need.

Regards

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Judith Coan-Stevens
